settings.title: Why are microcrystals a game changer?
settings.text:
Because they work wonders on those deep pimples that take forever to come up and because they work like a charm!

These have definitely helped me reduce my OCD skin picking/Dermatillomania.

settings.title: Why is the hydrocolloid patch so effective?
settings.text:
• Because for me, the Hydrocolloid works like a charm on those late-stage pimples that are "ready to blow" and erased pimples overnight.
• And because of the upgraded formula containing the unique skin-soothing Salicylic Acid and Anti-inflammatory effects of Centella Asiatica.

settings.title: When to use the WOW patches?
settings.text:
• Use the microcrystals patches Each time when you feel a hard-to-reach and stubborn one is ready to make an "undercover" entry.

• Use the hydrocolloid patches every time you see a "ready to blow" one and want to rapidly heal and "hide" it at the same time.

settings.title: What about the price?
settings.text:
This mega bundle of 162 WOW patches is actually the best deal on the market you can get for microcrystal and hydrocolloid patches.

This bundle was designed to offer you enough patches to last you for a long while.

Just think about how much you’ll save by stopping using tiring acne routines with creams that can't really get the job done.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.text: Our packaging is FSC Mix, meaning the paper we used within the products come from FSC-certified material & recycled material.

settings.title: Why made in South Korea?
settings.text:
Everyone knows South Korea is the innovator in the beauty space and no other comes close in this area.

The technology behind microcrystals is for real people, for real skin, and has real results.

settings.title: Why buy from OMMA?
settings.text:
• Because you’ll want to give a chance to the new player too, right?

• Because OMMA is not just another skincare brand, its story roots deeply into my life and was created as a pinnacle of my healing journey. I hope the products we carefully create will help you as much as they helped me.

• Because of our pledge: #revealtheinnerbeauty
We have pledged to help you bring out your inner beauty and let it be seen through your skin.

• Because OMMA was designed to be synonymous with protection, care, and nurturing and to represent your journey from within towards the origins, towards an ideal self, renewed and more self-aware of your own being.

settings.title: where are you located?
settings.text: Use these articles to answer questions that customers have about your products and services. You can use text, links and images and also group articles into categories.

settings.title: Free shipping
settings.text:
All orders are shipped using DHL, USPS or FEDEX. These services are fully trackable once the couriers have your order.

Shipping costs:
•Standard shipping is FREE for all orders during Official Launch.
•For Express shipping, a flat rate of $15 is charged at checkout.

Transit Time:
•For Standard Free shipping, transit time is usually between 3 and 4 Business days from the time your order is dispatched. 
•For express shipping, transit time is usually between 1 and 2 Business days from the time your order is dispatched.

settings.title: When will my order be dispatched?
settings.text: Your order will be prepared once we receive it. Orders before 8PM will be delivered the day after. After 8PM, orders will be delivered the day after tomorrow.

settings.title: i have not received my order yet, where is it?
settings.text: You should receive a notification email once your order has shipped. The email contains your order tracking number that you can track once you click it. You can also contact our support team if you did not receive any notification.

settings.title: how can i return a product?
settings.text:
SALE ITEMS POLICY

There are strictly no returns, exchanges or refunds on sale items unless the product is deemed damaged or faulty. If you believe your sale product qualifies, please email images of the issue & your order# to our customer service team: support@ommacosmetics.com

FULL PRICED PRODUCTS RETURNS POLICY

We offer FREE return postage for our US customers only.
All returns must be made within 30 days of your purchase date and must be in re-saleable condition (tags attached, unwashed and unworn).
All returns are actioned via a store credit, unless the the return matches the refund crtieria stated in the Refund Policy

Returns of sale items can only be accepted if they are faulty or damaged. Please refer to our Refund Policy.
